title: Ryutist
text:
Ryutist is a Japanese idol girl group formed in 2011. They made their major label debut in 2017 with their second studio album, Ryuto Geigi.


== Members ==


=== Current ===
Muu Ikarashi (五十嵐夢羽)
Tomoe Uno (宇野友恵)
Miku Yokoyama (横山実郁)


=== Former ===
Yūri Kimura (木村優里)
Wakana Ōishi (大石若奈)
Satō Nonoko (佐藤乃々子)
